墡字的基本解释

墡
shàn
白土。

墡字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shàn］
［《廣韻》常演切，上獮，禪。］
亦作“磰1”。
(1)白土，白垩。
(2)用于人名。明代有朱瞻墡。见《明史·诸王传四》。

墡字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　墡； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页238第32
【廣韻】常演切【集韻】上演切，?音善。【六書故】白埴土也。一曰周禮，爾雅，山海經?作堊。俗作墡，不宜分爲二字。

墡字的起名意思

白色的粘土。

Basic explanation of words
墡
shàn
White clay.
墡
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shàn］
["Guangyun" often plays and cuts, goes up and down, and Zen. ]
Also known as "磰1".
(1) White clay, chalk.
(2) Used for names. There was Zhu Zhanyi in the Ming Dynasty. See "History of Ming Dynasty·The Four Kings".
墡
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Ugly Collection] [The Ministry of Soil Characters] 　墡; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 238 32
[Guang Yun] often play cut [Ji Yun] stage cut, good sound. [Six Books] Baiyin soil also. One said Zhou Li, Erya, and the Classic of Mountains and Seas? It is not suitable to be divided into two characters.
